children.name: attribute
children.description: Generic entity metadata attributes of the group.

children.name: creation_time
children.description: Group creation time. Deprecated: creation_time should be populated in Attribute as generic metadata.

children.name: product_object_id
children.description: Product globally unique user object identifier, such as an LDAP Object Identifier.

children.name: windows_sid
children.description: Microsoft Windows SID of the group.
